trans-unit.target: <paramref name="input" /> 具有无效的格式。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="input" /> represents a number that is less than <see cref="F:System.TimeSpan.MinValue" /> or greater than <see cref="F:System.TimeSpan.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="input" /> 表示一个小于 <see cref="F:System.TimeSpan.MinValue" /> 或大于 <see cref="F:System.TimeSpan.MaxValue" /> 的数字。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: At least one of the days, hours, minutes, or seconds components in <paramref name="input" /> is outside its valid range.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="input" /> 中的天、小时、分钟或秒中至少有一个分量超出其有效范围。

trans-unit.source: Gets the seconds component of the time interval represented by the current <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> 结构所表示的时间间隔的秒数部分。

trans-unit.source: The second component of the current <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 当前 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> 结构的秒数部分。

trans-unit.source: The return value ranges from -59 through 59.
trans-unit.target: 返回值的范围为 -59 到 59。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.TimeSpan> value can be represented as [*-*]*d*.*hh*:*mm*:*ss*.*ff*, where the optional minus sign indicates a negative time interval, the *d* component is days, *hh* is hours as measured on a 24-hour clock, *mm* is minutes, *ss* is seconds, and *ff* is fractions of a second.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.TimeSpan>值可以表示为 [*-*]*d*。*hh*:*mm*:*ss*。*ff*，其中可选负号指示负时间间隔， *d*分量表示天， *hh*表示小时采用 24 小时制， *mm*为分钟， *ss*为秒，和*ff*为秒小数部分的第二个。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.TimeSpan.Seconds%2A> property is the seconds component, *ss*.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.TimeSpan.Seconds%2A>属性是秒组成部分， *ss*。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.TimeSpan.Seconds%2A> property represents whole seconds, whereas the <xref:System.TimeSpan.TotalSeconds%2A> property represents whole and fractional seconds.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.TimeSpan.Seconds%2A>属性表示整秒数，而<xref:System.TimeSpan.TotalSeconds%2A>属性表示整数和小数部分组成的秒数。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates several <xref:System.TimeSpan> objects and displays the <xref:System.TimeSpan.Seconds%2A> property of each.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建几个<xref:System.TimeSpan>对象，并显示<xref:System.TimeSpan.Seconds%2A>每个属性。

trans-unit.source: The time interval to be subtracted.
trans-unit.target: 要减去的时间间隔。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> object whose value is the difference between the specified <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> object and this instance.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> 对象，其值为指定的 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> 对象与此实例的值之差。

trans-unit.source: A new time interval whose value is the result of the value of this instance minus the value of <paramref name="ts" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个新的时间间隔，其值为此实例的值减去 <paramref name="ts" /> 的值所得的结果。

trans-unit.source: The return value must be between <xref:System.TimeSpan.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.TimeSpan.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>; otherwise, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 返回值必须介于之间<xref:System.TimeSpan.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.TimeSpan.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>; 否则为将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The return value is a new <xref:System.TimeSpan>; the original <xref:System.TimeSpan> is not modified.
trans-unit.target: 返回值是一种新<xref:System.TimeSpan>; 原始<xref:System.TimeSpan>则不会修改。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.TimeSpan.Subtract%2A> method to calculate the difference between a single <xref:System.TimeSpan> value and each of the time intervals in an array.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.TimeSpan.Subtract%2A>方法来计算单个之间的差异<xref:System.TimeSpan>值和每个数组中的时间段。

trans-unit.source: Note that, because <xref:System.TimeSpan> format strings do not include negative signs in the result string, the example uses conditional logic to include a negative sign with negative time intervals.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，因为<xref:System.TimeSpan>格式字符串不包含负符号在结果字符串中，示例使用条件逻辑包括负时间间隔为负号。

trans-unit.source: The return value is less than <see cref="F:System.TimeSpan.MinValue" /> or greater than <see cref="F:System.TimeSpan.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回值小于 <see cref="F:System.TimeSpan.MinValue" /> 或大于 <see cref="F:System.TimeSpan.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of ticks that represent the value of the current <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 获取表示当前 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> 结构的值的刻度数。

trans-unit.source: The number of ticks contained in this instance.
trans-unit.target: 此实例包含的刻度数。

trans-unit.source: The smallest unit of time is the tick, which is equal to 100 nanoseconds or one ten-millionth of a second.
trans-unit.target: 时间最小单位是刻度等于 100 纳秒或秒的一千万分之一。

trans-unit.source: There are 10,000 ticks in a millisecond.
trans-unit.target: 以毫秒为单位中有 10000 个计时周期。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.TimeSpan.Ticks%2A> property can be negative or positive to represent a negative or positive time interval.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.TimeSpan.Ticks%2A>属性可以为负或正来表示负或正时间间隔。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates several <xref:System.TimeSpan> objects and displays the <xref:System.TimeSpan.Ticks%2A> property of each.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建几个<xref:System.TimeSpan>对象，并显示<xref:System.TimeSpan.Ticks%2A>每个属性。

trans-unit.source: Represents the number of ticks in 1 day.
trans-unit.target: 表示一天中的刻度数。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 此字段为常数。

trans-unit.source: The value of this constant is 864 billion; that is, 864,000,000,000.
The following example references and displays the value of the <xref:System.TimeSpan.TicksPerDay> field.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例引用并显示的值<xref:System.TimeSpan.TicksPerDay>字段。

trans-unit.source: Represents the number of ticks in 1 hour.
trans-unit.target: 表示 1 小时的刻度数。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 此字段为常数。

trans-unit.source: The value of this constant is 36 billion; that is, 36,000,000,000.
The following example references and displays the value of the <xref:System.TimeSpan.TicksPerHour> field.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例引用并显示的值<xref:System.TimeSpan.TicksPerHour>字段。

trans-unit.source: Represents the number of ticks in 1 millisecond.
trans-unit.target: 表示 1 毫秒的刻度数。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 此字段为常数。

trans-unit.source: The value of this constant is 10 thousand; that is, 10,000.
The following example references and displays the value of the <xref:System.TimeSpan.TicksPerMillisecond> field.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例引用并显示的值<xref:System.TimeSpan.TicksPerMillisecond>字段。

trans-unit.source: Represents the number of ticks in 1 minute.
trans-unit.target: 表示 1 分钟的刻度数。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 此字段为常数。

trans-unit.source: The value of this constant is 600 million; that is, 600,000,000.
trans-unit.target: 此常量的值为 600 万;也就是说，600000000。

trans-unit.source: The following example references and displays the value of the <xref:System.TimeSpan.TicksPerMinute> field.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例引用并显示的值<xref:System.TimeSpan.TicksPerMinute>字段。

trans-unit.source: Represents the number of ticks in 1 second.
trans-unit.target: 表示 1 秒的刻度数。

trans-unit.source: The value of this constant is 10 million; that is, 10,000,000.
trans-unit.target: 此常量的值为 1000 万;也就是说，10000000。

trans-unit.source: The following example references and displays the value of the <xref:System.TimeSpan.TicksPerSecond> field.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例引用并显示的值<xref:System.TimeSpan.TicksPerSecond>字段。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the current <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> object to its equivalent string representation.
trans-unit.target: 将当前 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> 对象的值转换为其等效的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the current <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> object to its equivalent string representation.
trans-unit.target: 将当前 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> 对象的值转换为其等效的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: The string representation of the current <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 当前 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> 值的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: The returned string is formatted with the "c" format specifier and has the following format:
trans-unit.target: 返回的字符串"c"格式说明符进行格式设置，并且具有以下格式：

trans-unit.source: [-][*d*.]*hh*:*mm*:*ss*[.*fffffff*]
trans-unit.target: [-][*d*.]*hh*:*mm*:*ss*[.*fffffff*]

trans-unit.source: Elements in square brackets ([ and ]) may not be included in the returned string.
trans-unit.target: 元素在方括号 （[和]） 可能不包括在返回的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Colons and periods (: and.) are literal characters.
trans-unit.target: 冒号和句号 (: and。) 是原义字符。

trans-unit.source: The non-literal elements are listed in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 下表中列出的非文本元素。

trans-unit.source: Note that the string returned by the <xref:System.TimeSpan.ToString> method is not culture-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，返回的字符串<xref:System.TimeSpan.ToString>方法不是区分区域性的。

trans-unit.source: Item
trans-unit.target: 项

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: A minus sign, which indicates a negative time interval.
trans-unit.target: 减号，指示负时间间隔。

trans-unit.source: No sign is included for a positive time span.
trans-unit.target: 没有迹象是为了让正时间跨度。

trans-unit.source: The number of days in the time interval.
trans-unit.target: 中的时间间隔的天数数。

trans-unit.source: This element is omitted if the time interval is less than one day.
trans-unit.target: 如果对于小于一天的时间间隔，则忽略此元素。

trans-unit.source: The number of hours in the time interval, ranging from 0 to 23.
trans-unit.target: 中的时间间隔，范围从 0 到 23 小时数。

trans-unit.source: The number of minutes in the time interval, ranging from 0 to 59.
trans-unit.target: 中的时间间隔，范围从 0 到 59 分钟数。

trans-unit.source: The number of seconds in the time interval, ranging from 0 to 59.
trans-unit.target: 在从 0 到 59 之间的时间间隔的秒数。

trans-unit.source: "*fffffff*"
trans-unit.target: "*fffffff*"

trans-unit.source: Fractional seconds in the time interval.
trans-unit.target: 中的时间间隔的秒小数部分。

trans-unit.source: This element is omitted if the time interval does not include fractional seconds.
trans-unit.target: 如果时间间隔不包括秒的小数部分，则忽略此元素。

trans-unit.source: If present, fractional seconds are always expressed using seven decimal digits.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在，则始终使用七个十进制数字表示秒的小数部分。

trans-unit.source: For more information about comparing the string representation of <xref:System.TimeSpan> and Oracle data types, see Knowledge Base article [324577: System.TimeSpan Does Not Match Oracle 9i INTERVAL DAY TO SECOND Data Type](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=161146).
trans-unit.target: 有关比较的字符串表示形式<xref:System.TimeSpan>和 Oracle 数据类型，请参阅知识库文章[324577: System.TimeSpan 不匹配 Oracle 9i INTERVAL DAY TO 第二个数据类型](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=161146)。

trans-unit.source: The following example displays the strings returned by calling the <xref:System.TimeSpan.ToString%2A> method with a number of <xref:System.TimeSpan> values.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例显示通过调用返回的字符串<xref:System.TimeSpan.ToString%2A>方法与大量的<xref:System.TimeSpan>值。

trans-unit.source: Note that although the example does not call the <xref:System.TimeSpan.ToString%2A> method directly, it is called by the <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method when it attempts to convert a <xref:System.TimeSpan> value to its string representation.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，尽管该示例不调用<xref:System.TimeSpan.ToString%2A>方法直接，它由调用<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法尝试转换时<xref:System.TimeSpan>为其字符串表示形式的值。

trans-unit.source: Support for formatting <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> values was added in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 用于设置格式的支持<see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />值已添加到中[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: However, the <see cref="M:System.TimeSpan.ToString" /> method overload remains culture-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: 但是，<see cref="M:System.TimeSpan.ToString" />方法重载保留不区分区域性的。

trans-unit.source: Its behavior remains unchanged from previous versions of the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 其行为保持不变从以前版本的.NET Framework。

trans-unit.source: To control the formatting of a <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> value, call the <see cref="M:System.TimeSpan.ToString(System.String)" /> or <see cref="M:System.TimeSpan.ToString(System.String,System.IFormatProvider)" /> overload.
trans-unit.target: 若要控制的格式<see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />值时，请调用<see cref="M:System.TimeSpan.ToString(System.String)" />或<see cref="M:System.TimeSpan.ToString(System.String,System.IFormatProvider)" />重载。

trans-unit.source: A standard or custom <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> format string.
trans-unit.target: 标准或自定义的 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> 格式字符串。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the current <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> object to its equivalent string representation by using the specified format.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的格式将当前 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> 对象的值转换为其等效的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: The string representation of the current <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> value in the format specified by the <paramref name="format" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 当前 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> 值的字符串表示形式，该值使用 <paramref name="format" /> 参数指定的格式。

trans-unit.source: The `format` parameter can be any valid standard or custom format specifier for <xref:System.TimeSpan> values.
trans-unit.target: `format`参数可以是任何有效的标准或自定义格式说明符<xref:System.TimeSpan>值。

trans-unit.source: If `format` is equal to <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType> or is `null`, the return value of the current <xref:System.TimeSpan> object is formatted with the common format specifier ("c").
trans-unit.target: 如果`format`等同于<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>或`null`，当前的返回值<xref:System.TimeSpan>常见的格式说明符 ("c") 进行格式设置对象。

trans-unit.source: If `format` is any other value, the method throws a <xref:System.FormatException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`format`是任何其他值，该方法将引发<xref:System.FormatException>。

trans-unit.source: If `format` is a standard format string, the format of the returned string is defined by the formatting conventions of the current culture.
trans-unit.target: 如果`format`是标准格式字符串，返回字符串的格式由当前区域性的格式设置约定定义。

trans-unit.source: The custom format strings for <xref:System.TimeSpan> values do not include a date or time separator.
trans-unit.target: 自定义格式字符串为<xref:System.TimeSpan>值不包括日期或时间分隔符。

trans-unit.source: If you want to include these elements in your format string, you must treat them as character literals.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要在格式字符串中包含这些元素，你必须将它们视为字符文本。

trans-unit.source: See the example for an illustration, and see the [Custom TimeSpan Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-timespan-format-strings.md) topic for more information.
trans-unit.target: 查看有关说明，示例和查看[自定义 TimeSpan 格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-timespan-format-strings.md)有关详细信息的主题。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework provides extensive formatting support, which is described in greater detail in the following formatting topics:
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 提供了广泛的格式设置支持，以下的格式设置主题中的更详细地介绍：

trans-unit.source: For more information about format strings for <xref:System.TimeSpan> values, see [Standard TimeSpan Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-timespan-format-strings.md) and [Custom TimeSpan Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-timespan-format-strings.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息的格式字符串有关<xref:System.TimeSpan>值，请参阅[标准 TimeSpan 格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-timespan-format-strings.md)和[自定义 TimeSpan 格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-timespan-format-strings.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about support for formatting in the .NET Framework, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关.NET Framework 中的格式设置支持的详细信息，请参阅[格式化类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses standard and custom <xref:System.TimeSpan> format strings to display the string representation of each element in an array of <xref:System.TimeSpan> values
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用标准和自定义<xref:System.TimeSpan>格式字符串的数组中显示的字符串表示形式的每个元素<xref:System.TimeSpan>值

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="format" /> parameter is not recognized or is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 无法识别或不支持 <paramref name="format" /> 参数。

trans-unit.source: A standard or custom <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> format string.
trans-unit.target: 标准或自定义的 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> 格式字符串。

trans-unit.source: An object that supplies culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 一个提供区域性特定的格式设置信息的对象。

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the current <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> object to its equivalent string representation by using the specified format and culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的格式和区域性特定的格式设置信息，将当前 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> 对象的值转换为其等效字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: The string representation of the current <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> value, as specified by <paramref name="format" /> and <paramref name="formatProvider" />.
trans-unit.target: 当前 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> 值的字符串表示形式，由 <paramref name="format" /> 和 <paramref name="formatProvider" /> 指定。

trans-unit.source: The `format` parameter can be any valid standard or custom format specifier for <xref:System.TimeSpan> values.
trans-unit.target: `format`参数可以是任何有效的标准或自定义格式说明符<xref:System.TimeSpan>值。

trans-unit.source: If `format` is equal to <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType> or is `null`, the return value of the current <xref:System.TimeSpan> object is formatted with the common format specifier ("c").
trans-unit.target: 如果`format`等同于<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>或`null`，当前的返回值<xref:System.TimeSpan>常见的格式说明符 ("c") 进行格式设置对象。

trans-unit.source: If format is any other value, the method throws a <xref:System.FormatException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果格式是任何其他值，该方法将引发<xref:System.FormatException>。

trans-unit.source: The custom format strings for <xref:System.TimeSpan> values do not include a date or time separator.
trans-unit.target: 自定义格式字符串为<xref:System.TimeSpan>值不包括日期或时间分隔符。

trans-unit.source: If you want to include these elements in your format string, you must treat them as character literals.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要在格式字符串中包含这些元素，你必须将它们视为字符文本。

trans-unit.source: See the example for an illustration, and see the [Custom TimeSpan Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-timespan-format-strings.md) topic for more information.
trans-unit.target: 查看有关说明，示例和查看[自定义 TimeSpan 格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-timespan-format-strings.md)有关详细信息的主题。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework provides extensive formatting support, which is described in greater detail in the following formatting topics:
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 提供了广泛的格式设置支持，以下的格式设置主题中的更详细地介绍：

trans-unit.source: For more information about format strings for <xref:System.TimeSpan> values, see [Standard TimeSpan Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-timespan-format-strings.md) and [Custom TimeSpan Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-timespan-format-strings.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息的格式字符串有关<xref:System.TimeSpan>值，请参阅[标准 TimeSpan 格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-timespan-format-strings.md)和[自定义 TimeSpan 格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-timespan-format-strings.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about support for formatting in the .NET Framework, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关.NET Framework 中的格式设置支持的详细信息，请参阅[格式化类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。

trans-unit.source: The `formatProvider` parameter is an <xref:System.IFormatProvider> implementation that provides culture-specific information about the format of the returned string.
trans-unit.target: `formatProvider`参数是<xref:System.IFormatProvider>实现，提供返回字符串的格式的区域性特定信息。

trans-unit.source: The `formatProvider` parameter can be any of the following:
trans-unit.target: `formatProvider`参数可以是任何以下：

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that represents the culture whose formatting conventions are to be reflected in the returned string.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>代表其格式设置约定才会反映在返回的字符串的区域性的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object retuned by the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property defines the formatting of the returned string.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>所返回的对象<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性定义返回字符串的格式。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object that defines the formatting of the returned string.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>对象，用于定义返回字符串的格式。

trans-unit.source: A custom object that implements the <xref:System.IFormatProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: 实现一个自定义对象<xref:System.IFormatProvider>接口。

trans-unit.source: Its <xref:System.IFormatProvider.GetFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method returns a <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object that provides formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 其<xref:System.IFormatProvider.GetFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法返回<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>提供格式设置信息的对象。

trans-unit.source: If `formatProvider` is `null`, the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object that is associated with the current culture is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果`formatProvider`是`null`、<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>使用与当前区域性关联的对象。

trans-unit.source: If `format` is a custom format string, the `formatProvider` parameter is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果`format`是一个自定义格式字符串，`formatProvider`参数将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: The following example calls the <xref:System.TimeSpan.ToString%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29> method to format two time intervals.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例调用<xref:System.TimeSpan.ToString%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29>方法来设置格式的两个时间间隔。

trans-unit.source: The example calls the method twice for each format string, first to display it using the conventions of the en-US culture and then to display it using the conventions of the fr-FR culture.
trans-unit.target: 该示例调用两次首先要使用 EN-US 区域性的约定显示每个格式字符串的方法，然后使用 FR-FR 区域性的约定进行显示。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="format" /> parameter is not recognized or is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 无法识别或不支持 <paramref name="format" /> 参数。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the current <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> structure expressed in whole and fractional days.
trans-unit.target: 获取以整天数和天的小数部分表示的当前 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> 结构的值。

trans-unit.source: The total number of days represented by this instance.
trans-unit.target: 此实例表示的总天数。

trans-unit.source: This property converts the value of this instance from ticks to days.
trans-unit.target: 此属性将此实例的值由刻度数转换为天数。

trans-unit.source: This number might include whole and fractional days.
trans-unit.target: 此数字可能包括整数和小数部分组成的天数。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.TimeSpan.TotalDays%2A> property represents whole and fractional days, whereas the <xref:System.TimeSpan.Days%2A> property represents whole days.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.TimeSpan.TotalDays%2A>属性表示整数和小数部分组成的天数，而<xref:System.TimeSpan.Days%2A>属性表示完整天数。

trans-unit.source: The following example instantiates a <xref:System.TimeSpan> object and displays the value of its <xref:System.TimeSpan.TotalDays%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例实例化<xref:System.TimeSpan>对象，并显示的值其<xref:System.TimeSpan.TotalDays%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: It also displays the value of each component (hours, minutes, seconds, milliseconds) that forms the fractional part of the value of its <xref:System.TimeSpan.TotalDays%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 它还显示窗体的小数部分的值的每个组件 （小时、 分钟、 秒、 毫秒） 的值其<xref:System.TimeSpan.TotalDays%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the current <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> structure expressed in whole and fractional hours.
trans-unit.target: 获取以整小时数和小时的小数部分表示的当前 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> 结构的值。

trans-unit.source: The total number of hours represented by this instance.
trans-unit.target: 此实例表示的总小时数。

trans-unit.source: This property converts the value of this instance from ticks to hours.
trans-unit.target: 此属性将此实例的值由刻度数转换到几小时。

trans-unit.source: This number might include whole and fractional hours.
trans-unit.target: 此数字可能包括整数和小数部分组成的小时数。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.TimeSpan.TotalHours%2A> property represents whole and fractional hours, whereas the <xref:System.TimeSpan.Hours%2A> property represents whole hours.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.TimeSpan.TotalHours%2A>属性表示整数和小数部分组成的小时数，而<xref:System.TimeSpan.Hours%2A>属性表示整小时。

trans-unit.source: The following example instantiates a <xref:System.TimeSpan> object and displays the value its <xref:System.TimeSpan.TotalHours%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例实例化<xref:System.TimeSpan>对象，并显示值其<xref:System.TimeSpan.TotalHours%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: It also displays the value of each component (hours, minutes, seconds, and milliseconds) that forms the fractional part of the value of its <xref:System.TimeSpan.TotalHours%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 它还显示窗体的小数部分的值的每个组件 （小时数、 分钟、 秒和毫秒为单位） 的值其<xref:System.TimeSpan.TotalHours%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the current <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> structure expressed in whole and fractional milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: 获取以整毫秒数和毫秒的小数部分表示的当前 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> 结构的值。

trans-unit.source: The total number of milliseconds represented by this instance.
trans-unit.target: 此实例表示的总毫秒数。

trans-unit.source: This property converts the value of this instance from ticks to milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: 此属性将此实例的值由刻度数转换为毫秒。

trans-unit.source: This number might include whole and fractional milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: 此数字可能包括整数和小数部分组成的毫秒。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.TimeSpan.TotalMilliseconds%2A> property represents whole and fractional milliseconds, whereas the <xref:System.TimeSpan.Milliseconds%2A> property represents whole milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.TimeSpan.TotalMilliseconds%2A>属性表示整数和小数部分组成的毫秒，而<xref:System.TimeSpan.Milliseconds%2A>属性表示整毫秒。

trans-unit.source: The following example instantiates a <xref:System.TimeSpan> object and displays the value of its <xref:System.TimeSpan.TotalMilliseconds%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例实例化<xref:System.TimeSpan>对象，并显示的值其<xref:System.TimeSpan.TotalMilliseconds%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the current <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> structure expressed in whole and fractional minutes.
trans-unit.target: 获取以整分钟数和分钟的小数部分表示的当前 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> 结构的值。

trans-unit.source: The total number of minutes represented by this instance.
trans-unit.target: 此实例表示的总分钟数。

trans-unit.source: This property converts the value of this instance from ticks to minutes.
trans-unit.target: 此属性将此实例的值由刻度数转换为分钟。

trans-unit.source: This number might include whole and fractional minutes.
trans-unit.target: 此数字可能包括整数和小数部分组成的分钟。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.TimeSpan.TotalMinutes%2A> property represents whole and fractional minutes, whereas the <xref:System.TimeSpan.Minutes%2A> property represents whole minutes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.TimeSpan.TotalMinutes%2A>属性表示整数和小数部分组成的分钟，而<xref:System.TimeSpan.Minutes%2A>属性表示整分钟数。

trans-unit.source: The following example instantiates a <xref:System.TimeSpan> object and displays the value of its <xref:System.TimeSpan.TotalMinutes%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例实例化<xref:System.TimeSpan>对象，并显示的值其<xref:System.TimeSpan.TotalMinutes%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: It also displays the value of each component (seconds, milliseconds) that forms the fractional part of the value of its <xref:System.TimeSpan.TotalMinutes%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 它还显示窗体的小数部分的值的每个组件 （秒、 毫秒） 的值其<xref:System.TimeSpan.TotalMinutes%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the current <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> structure expressed in whole and fractional seconds.
trans-unit.target: 获取以整秒数和秒的小数部分表示的当前 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> 结构的值。

trans-unit.source: The total number of seconds represented by this instance.
trans-unit.target: 此实例表示的总秒数。

trans-unit.source: This property converts the value of this instance from ticks to seconds.
trans-unit.target: 此属性将此实例的值由刻度数转换为秒。

trans-unit.source: This number might include whole and fractional seconds.
trans-unit.target: 此数字可能包括整数和小数秒。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.TimeSpan.TotalSeconds%2A> property represents whole and fractional seconds, whereas the <xref:System.TimeSpan.Seconds%2A> property represents whole seconds.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.TimeSpan.TotalSeconds%2A>属性表示整数和小数秒，而<xref:System.TimeSpan.Seconds%2A>属性表示整秒数。

trans-unit.source: The following example instantiates a <xref:System.TimeSpan> object and displays the value of its <xref:System.TimeSpan.TotalSeconds%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例实例化<xref:System.TimeSpan>对象，并显示的值其<xref:System.TimeSpan.TotalSeconds%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: It also displays the value of its milliseconds component, which forms the fractional part of the value of its <xref:System.TimeSpan.TotalSeconds%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 它还显示它窗体的值的小数部分的毫秒部分的值的其<xref:System.TimeSpan.TotalSeconds%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified string representation of a time interval to its <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> equivalent and returns a value that indicates whether the conversion succeeded.
trans-unit.target: 将时间间隔的指定字符串表示形式转换为其等效的 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />，并返回一个指示转换是否成功的值。

trans-unit.source: A string that specifies the time interval to convert.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，用于指定进行转换的时间间隔。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains an object that represents the time interval specified by <c>s</c>, or <see cref="F:System.TimeSpan.Zero" /> if the conversion failed.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回时，包含表示由 <c>s</c> 指定的时间间隔的对象；或者如果转换失败，则包含 <see cref="F:System.TimeSpan.Zero" />。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 此参数未经初始化即被传递。

trans-unit.source: Converts the string representation of a time interval to its <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> equivalent and returns a value that indicates whether the conversion succeeded.
trans-unit.target: 将时间间隔的字符串表示形式转换为其等效的 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />，并返回一个指示转换是否成功的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="s" /> was converted successfully; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 成功转换，则为 <paramref name="s" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This operation returns <see langword="false" /> if the <paramref name="s" /> parameter is <see langword="null" /> or <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />, has an invalid format, represents a time interval that is less than <see cref="F:System.TimeSpan.MinValue" /> or greater than <see cref="F:System.TimeSpan.MaxValue" />, or has at least one days, hours, minutes, or seconds component outside its valid range.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="s" /> 参数为 <see langword="null" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />，格式无效，表示的时间间隔小于 <see cref="F:System.TimeSpan.MinValue" /> 或大于 <see cref="F:System.TimeSpan.MaxValue" />，或者天、小时、分钟或秒分量中至少有一个超出其有效范围，则此运算返回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.TimeSpan.TryParse%2A> method is like the <xref:System.TimeSpan.Parse%28System.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, except that it does not throw an exception if the conversion fails.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.TimeSpan.TryParse%2A>方法就像是<xref:System.TimeSpan.Parse%28System.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，但它不会引发异常，如果转换失败。

trans-unit.source: The `s` parameter contains a time interval specification in the form:
trans-unit.target: `s`参数包含一个时间间隔规范形式：

trans-unit.source: Elements in square brackets ([ and ]) are optional.
trans-unit.target: 方括号 ([ and ]) 中的元素是可选的。

trans-unit.source: One selection from the list of alternatives enclosed in braces ({ and }) and separated by vertical bars (|) is required.
trans-unit.target: 一个从列表中选择的替代项括在大括号 （{和}） 和由竖线分隔 (|) 是必需的。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes each element.
trans-unit.target: 下表描述每个元素。

trans-unit.source: Element
trans-unit.target: 元素

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: *ws*
trans-unit.target: *ws*

trans-unit.source: Optional white space.
trans-unit.target: 可选的空白区域。

trans-unit.source: An optional minus sign, which indicates a negative <xref:System.TimeSpan>.
trans-unit.target: 可选的负号，指示负<xref:System.TimeSpan>。

trans-unit.source: Days, ranging from 0 to 10675199.
A culture-sensitive symbol that separates days from hours.
trans-unit.target: 小时分隔天区分区域性的符号。

trans-unit.source: The invariant format uses a period (".") character.
trans-unit.target: 固定格式使用句点 ("。") 字符。

trans-unit.source: *hh*
trans-unit.target: *hh*

trans-unit.source: Hours, ranging from 0 to 23.
trans-unit.target: 小时数，范围从 0 到 23。

trans-unit.source: The culture-sensitive time separator symbol.
trans-unit.target: 区分区域性的时间分隔符符号。

trans-unit.source: The invariant format uses a colon (":") character.
trans-unit.target: 固定格式使用冒号 (":") 字符。

trans-unit.source: *mm*
trans-unit.target: *mm*

trans-unit.source: Minutes, ranging from 0 to 59.
trans-unit.target: 分钟数，范围从 0 到 59。

trans-unit.source: *ss*
trans-unit.target: *ss*

trans-unit.source: Optional seconds, ranging from 0 to 59.
trans-unit.target: 可选的秒，范围从 0 到 59。

trans-unit.source: A culture-sensitive symbol that separates seconds from fractions of a second.
trans-unit.target: 分数 （竖式） 的第二个分离开来秒区分区域性的符号。

trans-unit.source: The invariant format uses a period (".") character.
trans-unit.target: 固定格式使用句点 ("。") 字符。

trans-unit.source: *ff*
trans-unit.target: *ff*

trans-unit.source: Optional fractional seconds, consisting of one to seven decimal digits.
trans-unit.target: 可选秒的小数部分包含 1 到 7 十进制数字。

trans-unit.source: The components of `s` must collectively specify a time interval that is greater than or equal to <xref:System.TimeSpan.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType> and less than or equal to <xref:System.TimeSpan.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 组件`s`必须共同指定大于或等于的时间间隔<xref:System.TimeSpan.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>且小于或等于<xref:System.TimeSpan.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.TimeSpan.Parse%28System.String%29> method tries to parse `s` by using each of the culture-specific formats for the current culture.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.TimeSpan.Parse%28System.String%29>方法尝试分析`s`通过每个区域性特定的格式用于当前区域性。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.TimeSpan.TryParse%2A> method to create <xref:System.TimeSpan> objects from valid <xref:System.TimeSpan> strings and to indicate when the parse operation has failed because the time span string is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.TimeSpan.TryParse%2A>方法来创建<xref:System.TimeSpan>对象从有效<xref:System.TimeSpan>字符串，还可以指示在分析操作已失败，因为时间跨度字符串无效。

trans-unit.source: In some cases, when a time interval component in the string to be parsed contains more than seven digits, parsing operations that succeed in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)] and earlier versions may fail and throw an <see cref="T:System.OverflowException" /> in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], The following example illustrates this scenario.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下，当要分析的字符串中的时间间隔组件包含多个七个数字，分析操作中成功[!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)]和早期版本可能失败并引发<see cref="T:System.OverflowException" />中[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]，下面的示例说明了此方案。

trans-unit.source: A string that specifies the time interval to convert.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，用于指定进行转换的时间间隔。

trans-unit.source: An object that supplies culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 一个提供区域性特定的格式设置信息的对象。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains an object that represents the time interval specified by <c>input</c>, or <see cref="F:System.TimeSpan.Zero" /> if the conversion failed.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回时，包含表示由 <c>input</c> 指定的时间间隔的对象；或者如果转换失败，则包含 <see cref="F:System.TimeSpan.Zero" />。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 此参数未经初始化即被传递。

trans-unit.source: Converts the string representation of a time interval to its <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> equivalent by using the specified culture-specific formatting information, and returns a value that indicates whether the conversion succeeded.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的区域性特定格式设置信息，将时间间隔的字符串表示形式转换为其等效的 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />，并返回一个指示转换是否成功的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="input" /> was converted successfully; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 成功转换，则为 <paramref name="input" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This operation returns <see langword="false" /> if the <paramref name="input" /> parameter is <see langword="null" /> or <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />, has an invalid format, represents a time interval that is less than <see cref="F:System.TimeSpan.MinValue" /> or greater than <see cref="F:System.TimeSpan.MaxValue" />, or has at least one days, hours, minutes, or seconds component outside its valid range.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="input" /> 参数为 <see langword="null" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />，格式无效，表示的时间间隔小于 <see cref="F:System.TimeSpan.MinValue" /> 或大于 <see cref="F:System.TimeSpan.MaxValue" />，或者天、小时、分钟或秒分量中至少有一个超出其有效范围，则此运算返回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.TimeSpan.TryParse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.TimeSpan%40%29> method is like the <xref:System.TimeSpan.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29> method, except that it does not throw an exception if the conversion fails.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.TimeSpan.TryParse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.TimeSpan%40%29>方法就像是<xref:System.TimeSpan.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29>方法，但它不会引发异常，如果转换失败。

trans-unit.target: 可选秒的小数部分包含 1 到 7 十进制数字。

trans-unit.source: The components of `input` must collectively specify a time interval that is greater than or equal to <xref:System.TimeSpan.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType> and less than or equal to <xref:System.TimeSpan.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 组件`input`必须共同指定大于或等于的时间间隔<xref:System.TimeSpan.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>且小于或等于<xref:System.TimeSpan.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.TimeSpan.TryParse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.TimeSpan%40%29> method tries to parse `input` by using each of the culture-specific formats for the culture specified by `formatProvider`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.TimeSpan.TryParse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.TimeSpan%40%29>方法尝试分析`input`通过每个区域性特定的格式用于指定的区域性`formatProvider`。

trans-unit.source: The `formatProvider` parameter is an <xref:System.IFormatProvider> implementation that provides culture-specific information about the format of the returned string.
trans-unit.target: `formatProvider`参数是<xref:System.IFormatProvider>实现，提供返回字符串的格式的区域性特定信息。

trans-unit.source: The `formatProvider` parameter can be any of the following:
trans-unit.target: `formatProvider`参数可以是任何以下：

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that represents the culture whose formatting conventions are to be reflected in the returned string.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>代表其格式设置约定才会反映在返回的字符串的区域性的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object returned by the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property defines the formatting of the returned string.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>返回对象<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性定义返回字符串的格式。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object that defines the formatting of the returned string.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>对象，用于定义返回字符串的格式。

trans-unit.source: A custom object that implements the <xref:System.IFormatProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: 实现一个自定义对象<xref:System.IFormatProvider>接口。

trans-unit.source: Its <xref:System.IFormatProvider.GetFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method returns a <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object that provides formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 其<xref:System.IFormatProvider.GetFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法返回<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>提供格式设置信息的对象。

trans-unit.source: If `formatProvider` is `null`, the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object that is associated with the current culture is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果`formatProvider`是`null`、<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>使用与当前区域性关联的对象。

trans-unit.source: The following example defines an array of <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> objects, and uses each object in calls to the <xref:System.TimeSpan.TryParse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.TimeSpan%40%29> method to parse the elements in a string array.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例定义一个数组<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>对象，并在调用中使用每个对象<xref:System.TimeSpan.TryParse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.TimeSpan%40%29>方法，以便分析的字符串数组中的元素。

trans-unit.source: The example illustrates how the conventions of a specific culture influence the formatting operation.
trans-unit.target: 该示例说明如何特定区域性的约定影响格式设置操作。

trans-unit.source: In some cases, when a time interval component in the string to be parsed contains more than seven digits, parsing operations that succeed and return <see langword="true" /> in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)] and earlier versions may fail and return <see langword="false" /> in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], The following example illustrates this scenario.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下，当要分析的字符串中的时间间隔组件包含多个七个数字，分析操作成功，并且返回<see langword="true" />中[!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)]和早期版本可能会失败并返回<see langword="false" />中[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]，下面的示例阐释了这种情况。

trans-unit.source: Converts the string representation of a time interval to its <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> equivalent, and returns a value that indicates whether the conversion succeeded.
trans-unit.target: 将时间间隔的字符串表示形式转换为其等效的 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />，并返回一个指示转换是否成功的值。

trans-unit.source: The format of the string representation must match a specified format exactly.
trans-unit.target: 字符串表示形式的格式必须与指定的格式完全匹配。

trans-unit.source: A string that specifies the time interval to convert.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，用于指定进行转换的时间间隔。

trans-unit.source: A standard or custom format string that defines the required format of <c>input</c>.
trans-unit.target: 用于定义所需的 <c>input</c> 格式的标准或自定义格式字符串。

trans-unit.source: An object that supplies culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 一个提供区域性特定的格式设置信息的对象。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains an object that represents the time interval specified by <c>input</c>, or <see cref="F:System.TimeSpan.Zero" /> if the conversion failed.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回时，包含表示由 <c>input</c> 指定的时间间隔的对象；或者如果转换失败，则包含 <see cref="F:System.TimeSpan.Zero" />。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 此参数未经初始化即被传递。

trans-unit.source: Converts the string representation of a time interval to its <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> equivalent by using the specified format and culture-specific format information, and returns a value that indicates whether the conversion succeeded.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的格式和区域性特定格式信息，将时间间隔的字符串表示形式转换为其等效的 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />，并返回一个指示转换是否成功的值。

trans-unit.source: The format of the string representation must match the specified format exactly.
trans-unit.target: 字符串表示形式的格式必须与指定的格式完全匹配。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="input" /> was converted successfully; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 成功转换，则为 <paramref name="input" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.TimeSpan.TryParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.TimeSpan%40%29> method parses the string representation of a time interval, which must be in the format defined by the `format` parameter, except that leading and trailing white-space characters are ignored.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.TimeSpan.TryParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.TimeSpan%40%29>方法分析的时间间隔，它必须是定义的格式的字符串表示`format`参数，只不过该前导和尾随空白字符将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: This method is similar to the <xref:System.TimeSpan.ParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29> method, except that it does not throw an exception if the conversion fails.
trans-unit.target: 此方法类似于是<xref:System.TimeSpan.ParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29>方法，但它不会引发异常，如果转换失败。

trans-unit.source: The `format` parameter is a string that contains either a single standard format specifier, or one or more custom format specifiers that define the required format of `input`.
trans-unit.target: `format`参数是一个字符串，包含单个标准格式说明符或一个或多个定义的所需的格式的自定义格式说明符`input`。

trans-unit.source: For more information about valid format strings, see [Standard TimeSpan Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-timespan-format-strings.md) and [Custom TimeSpan Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-timespan-format-strings.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关有效的格式字符串的详细信息，请参阅[标准 TimeSpan 格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-timespan-format-strings.md)和[自定义 TimeSpan 格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-timespan-format-strings.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.TimeSpan.TryParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.TimeSpan%40%29> method uses the conventions of the culture specified by the `formatProvider` parameter only if `format` is a standard <xref:System.TimeSpan> format string whose value is either "g" or "G".
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.TimeSpan.TryParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.TimeSpan%40%29>方法使用由指定的区域性的约定`formatProvider`仅当`format`是一种标准<xref:System.TimeSpan>字符串设置其值为"g"或"G"格式。

trans-unit.source: The "c", "t", and "T" standard format strings use the formatting conventions of the invariant culture.
trans-unit.target: "C"、"t"和"T"标准格式字符串使用固定区域性的格式设置约定。

trans-unit.source: Custom format strings define the precise format of the input string and use literal characters to separate the components of a time interval.
trans-unit.target: 自定义格式字符串定义的输入字符串的确切格式，并使用原义字符分隔的时间间隔内的组件。

trans-unit.source: The `formatProvider` parameter is an <xref:System.IFormatProvider> implementation that provides culture-specific information about the format of the returned string if `format` is a standard format string.
trans-unit.target: `formatProvider`参数是<xref:System.IFormatProvider>实现，提供返回字符串的格式的区域性特定信息，如果`format`是一个标准格式字符串。

trans-unit.source: The `formatProvider` parameter can be any of the following:
trans-unit.target: `formatProvider`参数可以是任何以下：

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that represents the culture whose formatting conventions are to be reflected in the returned string.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>代表其格式设置约定才会反映在返回的字符串的区域性的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object returned by the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property defines the formatting of the returned string.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>返回对象<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性定义返回字符串的格式。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object that defines the formatting of the returned string.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>对象，用于定义返回字符串的格式。

trans-unit.source: A custom object that implements the <xref:System.IFormatProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: 实现一个自定义对象<xref:System.IFormatProvider>接口。

trans-unit.source: Its <xref:System.IFormatProvider.GetFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method returns a <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object that provides formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 其<xref:System.IFormatProvider.GetFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法返回<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>提供格式设置信息的对象。

trans-unit.source: If `formatProvider` is `null`, the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object that is associated with the current culture is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果`formatProvider`是`null`、<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>使用与当前区域性关联的对象。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.TimeSpan.TryParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.TimeSpanStyles%2CSystem.TimeSpan%40%29> method to parse several string representations of time intervals using various format strings and cultures.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.TimeSpan.TryParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.TimeSpanStyles%2CSystem.TimeSpan%40%29>方法，以便分析的时间间隔使用各种格式字符串和区域性的多个字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: A string that specifies the time interval to convert.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，用于指定进行转换的时间间隔。

trans-unit.source: A array of standard or custom format strings that define the acceptable formats of <c>input</c>.
trans-unit.target: 用于定义可接受的 <c>input</c> 格式的标准或自定义格式字符串的数组。

trans-unit.source: An object that provides culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，提供区域性特定的格式设置信息。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains an object that represents the time interval specified by <c>input</c>, or <see cref="F:System.TimeSpan.Zero" /> if the conversion failed.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回时，包含表示由 <c>input</c> 指定的时间间隔的对象；或者如果转换失败，则包含 <see cref="F:System.TimeSpan.Zero" />。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 此参数未经初始化即被传递。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified string representation of a time interval to its <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> equivalent by using the specified formats and culture-specific format information, and returns a value that indicates whether the conversion succeeded.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的格式和区域性特定格式信息，将时间间隔的指定字符串表示形式转换为其等效的 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />，并返回一个指示转换是否成功的值。

trans-unit.source: The format of the string representation must match one of the specified formats exactly.
trans-unit.target: 字符串表示形式的格式必须与一种指定的格式完全匹配。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="input" /> was converted successfully; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 成功转换，则为 <paramref name="input" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.TimeSpan.TryParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%5B%5D%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.TimeSpan%40%29> method parses the string representation of a time interval, which must be in the format defined by one of the format strings specified by the `formats` parameter, except that leading and trailing white-space characters are ignored.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.TimeSpan.TryParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%5B%5D%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.TimeSpan%40%29>方法分析的时间间隔，它必须是定义由一个由指定的格式字符串的格式的字符串表示`formats`参数，只不过该前导和尾随空白字符将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: This method is similar to the <xref:System.TimeSpan.ParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%5B%5D%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29> method, except that it does not throw an exception if the conversion fails.
trans-unit.target: 此方法类似于是<xref:System.TimeSpan.ParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%5B%5D%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29>方法，但它不会引发异常，如果转换失败。

trans-unit.source: The `formats` parameter is a string array whose elements consist of either a single standard format specifier, or one or more custom format specifiers that define the required format of `input`.
trans-unit.target: `formats`参数是一个字符串数组，其元素由单一的标准格式说明符或一个或多个定义的所需的格式的自定义格式说明符组成`input`。

trans-unit.source: For more information about valid format strings, see [Standard TimeSpan Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-timespan-format-strings.md) and [Custom TimeSpan Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-timespan-format-strings.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关有效的格式字符串的详细信息，请参阅[标准 TimeSpan 格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-timespan-format-strings.md)和[自定义 TimeSpan 格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-timespan-format-strings.md)。

trans-unit.source: `input` must correspond exactly to a member of `formats` for the parse operation to succeed.
trans-unit.target: `input` 必须精确对应于的成员`formats`分析操作成功。

trans-unit.source: The parse operation attempts to match `input` to each element in `formats` starting with the first element in the array.
trans-unit.target: 分析操作尝试匹配`input`中的所有元素`formats`从数组中的第一个元素开始。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.TimeSpan.TryParseExact%2A> method uses the conventions of the culture specified by the `formatProvider` parameter only if the format string used to parse `input` is a standard <xref:System.TimeSpan> format string whose value is either "g" or "G".
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.TimeSpan.TryParseExact%2A>方法使用由指定的区域性的约定`formatProvider`参数仅当格式字符串用于分析`input`是一种标准<xref:System.TimeSpan>字符串设置其值为"g"或"G"格式。

trans-unit.source: The "c", "t", and "T" standard format strings use the formatting conventions of the invariant culture.
trans-unit.target: "C"、"t"和"T"标准格式字符串使用固定区域性的格式设置约定。

trans-unit.source: Custom format strings define the precise format of the input string and use literal characters to separate the components of a time interval.
trans-unit.target: 自定义格式字符串定义的输入字符串的确切格式，并使用原义字符分隔的时间间隔内的组件。

trans-unit.source: The `formatProvider` parameter is an <xref:System.IFormatProvider> implementation that provides culture-specific information about the format of the returned string if the format string used to parse `input` is a standard format string.
trans-unit.target: `formatProvider`参数是<xref:System.IFormatProvider>实现，提供返回字符串的格式的区域性特定信息，如果格式字符串用于分析`input`是一个标准格式字符串。

trans-unit.source: The `formatProvider` parameter can be any of the following:
trans-unit.target: `formatProvider`参数可以是任何以下：

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that represents the culture whose formatting conventions are to be reflected in the returned string.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>代表其格式设置约定才会反映在返回的字符串的区域性的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object returned by the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property defines the formatting of the returned string.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>返回对象<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性定义返回字符串的格式。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object that defines the formatting of the returned string.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>对象，用于定义返回字符串的格式。

trans-unit.source: A custom object that implements the <xref:System.IFormatProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: 实现一个自定义对象<xref:System.IFormatProvider>接口。

trans-unit.source: Its <xref:System.IFormatProvider.GetFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method returns a <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object that provides formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 其<xref:System.IFormatProvider.GetFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法返回<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>提供格式设置信息的对象。

trans-unit.source: If `formatProvider` is `null`, the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object that is associated with the current culture is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果`formatProvider`是`null`、<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>使用与当前区域性关联的对象。

trans-unit.source: The following example calls the <xref:System.TimeSpan.TryParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%5B%5D%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.TimeSpan%40%29> method to convert each element of a string array to a <xref:System.TimeSpan> value.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例调用<xref:System.TimeSpan.TryParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%5B%5D%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.TimeSpan%40%29>方法将转换到的字符串数组的每个元素<xref:System.TimeSpan>值。

trans-unit.source: The example interprets the strings by using the formatting conventions of the French - France ("fr-FR") culture.
trans-unit.target: 该示例通过使用法语-法国 ("FR-FR") 区域性的格式设置约定解释字符串。

trans-unit.source: The strings can represent a time interval in either the general short format or the general long format.
trans-unit.target: 字符串可以表示常规短格式或常规长格式的时间间隔。

trans-unit.source: In addition, the example changes the way in which the time interval parsing methods interpret a single digit.
trans-unit.target: 此外，该示例更改时间间隔分析方法在其中解释有一位数字的方式。

trans-unit.source: Ordinarily, a single digit is interpreted as the number of days in a time interval.
trans-unit.target: 通常，有一位数字解释为时间间隔的天数。

trans-unit.source: Instead, the `%h` custom format string is used to interpret a single digit as the number of hours.
trans-unit.target: 相反，`%h`自定义格式字符串用于将单个数字解释为的小时数。

trans-unit.source: For this change to be effective, note that the `%h` custom format string must precede the other format strings in the `formats` array.
trans-unit.target: 有关此更改后才能生效，请注意，`%h`自定义格式字符串必须位于之前中的其他格式字符串`formats`数组。

trans-unit.source: A string that specifies the time interval to convert.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，用于指定进行转换的时间间隔。

trans-unit.source: A standard or custom format string that defines the required format of <c>input</c>.
trans-unit.target: 用于定义所需的 <c>input</c> 格式的标准或自定义格式字符串。

trans-unit.source: An object that provides culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，提供区域性特定的格式设置信息。

trans-unit.source: One or more enumeration values that indicate the style of <c>input</c>.
trans-unit.target: 用于指示 <c>input</c> 的样式的一个或多个枚举值。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains an object that represents the time interval specified by <c>input</c>, or <see cref="F:System.TimeSpan.Zero" /> if the conversion failed.

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 此参数未经初始化即被传递。

trans-unit.source: Converts the string representation of a time interval to its <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> equivalent by using the specified format, culture-specific format information, and styles, and returns a value that indicates whether the conversion succeeded.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的格式、区域性特定格式信息和样式，将时间间隔的字符串表示形式转换为其等效的 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />，并返回一个指示转换是否成功的值。

trans-unit.target: 字符串表示形式的格式必须与指定的格式完全匹配。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="input" /> was converted successfully; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 成功转换，则为 <paramref name="input" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.TimeSpan.TryParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.TimeSpanStyles%2CSystem.TimeSpan%40%29> method parses the string representation of a time interval, which must be in the format defined by the `format` parameter, except that leading and trailing white-space characters are ignored.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.TimeSpan.TryParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.TimeSpanStyles%2CSystem.TimeSpan%40%29>方法分析的时间间隔，它必须是定义的格式的字符串表示`format`参数，只不过该前导和尾随空白字符将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: This method is similar to the <xref:System.TimeSpan.ParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.TimeSpanStyles%29> method, except that it does not throw an exception if the conversion fails.
trans-unit.target: 此方法类似于是<xref:System.TimeSpan.ParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.TimeSpanStyles%29>方法，但它不会引发异常，如果转换失败。

trans-unit.source: The `format` parameter is a string that contains either a single standard format specifier, or one or more custom format specifiers that define the required format of `input`.
trans-unit.target: `format`参数是一个字符串，包含单个标准格式说明符或一个或多个定义的所需的格式的自定义格式说明符`input`。

trans-unit.source: For more information about valid format strings, see [Standard TimeSpan Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-timespan-format-strings.md) and [Custom TimeSpan Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-timespan-format-strings.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关有效的格式字符串的详细信息，请参阅[标准 TimeSpan 格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-timespan-format-strings.md)和[自定义 TimeSpan 格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-timespan-format-strings.md)。

trans-unit.source: The `formatProvider` parameter is an <xref:System.IFormatProvider> implementation that provides culture-specific information about the format of the returned string if `format` is a standard format string.
trans-unit.target: `formatProvider`参数是<xref:System.IFormatProvider>实现，提供返回字符串的格式的区域性特定信息，如果`format`是一个标准格式字符串。

trans-unit.source: The `formatProvider` parameter can be any of the following:
trans-unit.target: `formatProvider`参数可以是任何以下：

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that represents the culture whose formatting conventions are to be reflected in the returned string.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>代表其格式设置约定才会反映在返回的字符串的区域性的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object returned by the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property defines the formatting of the returned string.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>返回对象<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性定义返回字符串的格式。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object that defines the formatting of the returned string.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>对象，用于定义返回字符串的格式。

trans-unit.source: A custom object that implements the <xref:System.IFormatProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: 实现一个自定义对象<xref:System.IFormatProvider>接口。

trans-unit.source: Its <xref:System.IFormatProvider.GetFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method returns a <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object that provides formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 其<xref:System.IFormatProvider.GetFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法返回<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>提供格式设置信息的对象。

trans-unit.source: If `formatProvider` is `null`, the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object that is associated with the current culture is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果`formatProvider`是`null`、<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>使用与当前区域性关联的对象。

trans-unit.source: The `styles` parameter affects the interpretation of strings parsed using custom format strings.
trans-unit.target: `styles`参数会影响使用自定义格式字符串分析的字符串的解释。

trans-unit.source: It determines whether `input` is interpreted as a negative time interval only if a negative sign is present (<xref:System.Globalization.TimeSpanStyles.None?displayProperty=nameWithType>), or whether it is always interpreted as a negative time interval (<xref:System.Globalization.TimeSpanStyles.AssumeNegative?displayProperty=nameWithType>).
trans-unit.target: 它确定是否`input`负号存在时才被解释为负时间间隔 (<xref:System.Globalization.TimeSpanStyles.None?displayProperty=nameWithType>)，或是否始终解释为负时间间隔 (<xref:System.Globalization.TimeSpanStyles.AssumeNegative?displayProperty=nameWithType>)。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Globalization.TimeSpanStyles.AssumeNegative?displayProperty=nameWithType> is not used, `format` must include a literal negative sign symbol (such as "\\-") to successfully parse a negative time interval.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Globalization.TimeSpanStyles.AssumeNegative?displayProperty=nameWithType>未使用，`format`必须包含文本的负号符号 (如"\\-") 为成功分析负时间间隔。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.TimeSpan.ParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29> method to parse several string representations of time intervals using various format strings and cultures.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.TimeSpan.ParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29>方法，以便分析的时间间隔使用各种格式字符串和区域性的多个字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: It also uses the <xref:System.Globalization.TimeSpanStyles.AssumeNegative?displayProperty=nameWithType> value to interpret each string as a negative time interval.
trans-unit.target: 它还使用<xref:System.Globalization.TimeSpanStyles.AssumeNegative?displayProperty=nameWithType>要解释为负时间间隔的每个字符串值。

trans-unit.source: The output from the example illustrates that the <xref:System.Globalization.TimeSpanStyles.AssumeNegative?displayProperty=nameWithType> style affects the return value only when it is used with custom format strings.
trans-unit.target: 输出示例中的阐释了<xref:System.Globalization.TimeSpanStyles.AssumeNegative?displayProperty=nameWithType>样式会影响返回值，仅当将它用于自定义格式字符串。

trans-unit.source: A string that specifies the time interval to convert.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，用于指定进行转换的时间间隔。

trans-unit.source: A array of standard or custom format strings that define the acceptable formats of <c>input</c>.
trans-unit.target: 用于定义可接受的 <c>input</c> 格式的标准或自定义格式字符串的数组。

trans-unit.source: An object that supplies culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 一个提供区域性特定的格式设置信息的对象。

trans-unit.source: One or more enumeration values that indicate the style of <c>input</c>.
trans-unit.target: 用于指示 <c>input</c> 的样式的一个或多个枚举值。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains an object that represents the time interval specified by <c>input</c>, or <see cref="F:System.TimeSpan.Zero" /> if the conversion failed.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回时，包含表示由 <c>input</c> 指定的时间间隔的对象；或者如果转换失败，则包含 <see cref="F:System.TimeSpan.Zero" />。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 此参数未经初始化即被传递。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified string representation of a time interval to its <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> equivalent by using the specified formats, culture-specific format information, and styles, and returns a value that indicates whether the conversion succeeded.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的格式、区域性特定格式信息和样式，将时间间隔的指定字符串表示形式转换为其等效的 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />，并返回一个指示转换是否成功的值。

trans-unit.source: The format of the string representation must match one of the specified formats exactly.
trans-unit.target: 字符串表示形式的格式必须与一种指定的格式完全匹配。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="input" /> was converted successfully; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 成功转换，则为 <paramref name="input" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.TimeSpan.TryParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%5B%5D%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.TimeSpanStyles%2CSystem.TimeSpan%40%29> method parses the string representation of a time interval, which must be in the format defined by one of the format strings specified by the `formats` parameter, except that leading and trailing white-space characters are ignored.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.TimeSpan.TryParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%5B%5D%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.TimeSpanStyles%2CSystem.TimeSpan%40%29>方法分析的时间间隔，它必须是定义由一个由指定的格式字符串的格式的字符串表示`formats`参数，只不过该前导和尾随空白字符将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: This method is similar to the <xref:System.TimeSpan.ParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%5B%5D%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.TimeSpanStyles%29> method, except that it does not throw an exception if the conversion fails.
trans-unit.target: 此方法类似于是<xref:System.TimeSpan.ParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%5B%5D%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.TimeSpanStyles%29>方法，但它不会引发异常，如果转换失败。

trans-unit.source: The `formats` parameter is a string array whose elements consist of either a single standard format specifier, or one or more custom format specifiers that define the required format of `input`.
trans-unit.target: `formats`参数是一个字符串数组，其元素由单一的标准格式说明符或一个或多个定义的所需的格式的自定义格式说明符组成`input`。

trans-unit.source: For more information about valid format strings, see [Standard TimeSpan Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-timespan-format-strings.md) and [Custom TimeSpan Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-timespan-format-strings.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关有效的格式字符串的详细信息，请参阅[标准 TimeSpan 格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-timespan-format-strings.md)和[自定义 TimeSpan 格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-timespan-format-strings.md)。

trans-unit.source: `input` must correspond exactly to a member of `formats` for the parse operation to succeed.
trans-unit.target: `input` 必须精确对应于的成员`formats`分析操作成功。

trans-unit.source: The parse operation attempts to match `input` to each element in `formats` starting with the first element in the array.
trans-unit.target: 分析操作尝试匹配`input`中的所有元素`formats`从数组中的第一个元素开始。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.TimeSpan.ParseExact%2A> method uses the conventions of the culture specified by the `formatProvider` parameter only if the format string used to parse `input` is a standard <xref:System.TimeSpan> format string whose value is either "g" or "G".
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.TimeSpan.ParseExact%2A>方法使用由指定的区域性的约定`formatProvider`参数仅当格式字符串用于分析`input`是一种标准<xref:System.TimeSpan>字符串设置其值为"g"或"G"格式。

trans-unit.source: The "c", "t", and "T" standard format strings use the formatting conventions of the invariant culture.
trans-unit.target: "C"、"t"和"T"标准格式字符串使用固定区域性的格式设置约定。

trans-unit.source: Custom format strings define the precise format of the input string and use literal characters to separate the components of a time interval.
trans-unit.target: 自定义格式字符串定义的输入字符串的确切格式，并使用原义字符分隔的时间间隔内的组件。

trans-unit.source: The `formatProvider` parameter is an <xref:System.IFormatProvider> implementation that provides culture-specific information about the format of the returned string if the format string used to parse `input` is a standard format string.
trans-unit.target: `formatProvider`参数是<xref:System.IFormatProvider>实现，提供返回字符串的格式的区域性特定信息，如果格式字符串用于分析`input`是一个标准格式字符串。

trans-unit.source: The `formatProvider` parameter can be any of the following:
trans-unit.target: `formatProvider`参数可以是任何以下：

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that represents the culture whose formatting conventions are to be reflected in the returned string.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>代表其格式设置约定才会反映在返回的字符串的区域性的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object returned by the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property defines the formatting of the returned string.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>返回对象<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性定义返回字符串的格式。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object that defines the formatting of the returned string.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>对象，用于定义返回字符串的格式。

trans-unit.source: A custom object that implements the <xref:System.IFormatProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: 实现一个自定义对象<xref:System.IFormatProvider>接口。

trans-unit.source: Its <xref:System.IFormatProvider.GetFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method returns a <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object that provides formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 其<xref:System.IFormatProvider.GetFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法返回<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>提供格式设置信息的对象。

trans-unit.source: If `formatProvider` is `null`, the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object that is associated with the current culture is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果`formatProvider`是`null`、<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>使用与当前区域性关联的对象。

trans-unit.source: The `styles` parameter affects the interpretation of strings that are parsed using custom format strings.
trans-unit.target: `styles`参数会影响使用自定义格式字符串分析的字符串的解释。

trans-unit.source: It determines whether `input` is interpreted as a negative time interval only if a negative sign is present (<xref:System.Globalization.TimeSpanStyles.None?displayProperty=nameWithType>), or whether it is always interpreted as a negative time interval (<xref:System.Globalization.TimeSpanStyles.AssumeNegative?displayProperty=nameWithType>).
trans-unit.target: 它确定是否`input`负号存在时才被解释为负时间间隔 (<xref:System.Globalization.TimeSpanStyles.None?displayProperty=nameWithType>)，或是否始终解释为负时间间隔 (<xref:System.Globalization.TimeSpanStyles.AssumeNegative?displayProperty=nameWithType>)。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Globalization.TimeSpanStyles.AssumeNegative?displayProperty=nameWithType> is not used, `format` must include a literal negative sign symbol (such as "\\-") to successfully parse a negative time interval.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Globalization.TimeSpanStyles.AssumeNegative?displayProperty=nameWithType>未使用，`format`必须包含文本的负号符号 (如"\\-") 为成功分析负时间间隔。

trans-unit.source: The following example calls the <xref:System.TimeSpan.TryParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%5B%5D%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.TimeSpanStyles%2CSystem.TimeSpan%40%29> method to convert each element of a string array to a <xref:System.TimeSpan> value.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例调用<xref:System.TimeSpan.TryParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%5B%5D%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.TimeSpanStyles%2CSystem.TimeSpan%40%29>方法将转换到的字符串数组的每个元素<xref:System.TimeSpan>值。

trans-unit.source: The strings can represent a time interval in either the general short format or the general long format.
trans-unit.target: 字符串可以表示常规短格式或常规长格式的时间间隔。

trans-unit.source: In addition, the example changes the way in which the time interval parsing methods interpret a single digit.
trans-unit.target: 此外，该示例更改时间间隔分析方法在其中解释有一位数字的方式。

trans-unit.source: Ordinarily, a single digit is interpreted as the number of days in a time interval.
trans-unit.target: 通常，有一位数字解释为时间间隔的天数。

trans-unit.source: Instead, the `%h` custom format string is used to interpret a single digit as the number of hours.
trans-unit.target: 相反，`%h`自定义格式字符串用于将单个数字解释为的小时数。

trans-unit.source: For this change to be effective, note that the `%h` custom format string must precede the other format strings in the `formats` array.
trans-unit.target: 有关此更改后才能生效，请注意，`%h`自定义格式字符串必须位于之前中的其他格式字符串`formats`数组。

trans-unit.source: Also note from the output that the <xref:System.Globalization.TimeSpanStyles.AssumeNegative?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag specified in the method call is used only when parsing a string with this format specifier.
trans-unit.target: 另请注意从输出的<xref:System.Globalization.TimeSpanStyles.AssumeNegative?displayProperty=nameWithType>仅在使用此格式说明符分析字符串时，才使用方法调用中指定的标志。

trans-unit.source: Represents the zero <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 表示零 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此字段为只读。

trans-unit.source: Because the value of the <xref:System.TimeSpan.Zero> field is a <xref:System.TimeSpan> object that represents a zero time value, you can compare it with other <xref:System.TimeSpan> objects to determine whether the latter represent positive, non-zero, or negative time intervals.
trans-unit.target: 因为的值<xref:System.TimeSpan.Zero>字段是<xref:System.TimeSpan>对象，表示零时间值，将其与其他进行比较<xref:System.TimeSpan>对象以确定是否后者，则表示正、 非零，或负时间间隔。

trans-unit.source: You can also use this field to initialize a <xref:System.TimeSpan> object to a zero time value.
trans-unit.target: 此外可以使用此字段来初始化<xref:System.TimeSpan>为零时间值的对象。

trans-unit.source: The following example references and displays the value of the <xref:System.TimeSpan.Zero> field.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例引用并显示的值<xref:System.TimeSpan.Zero>字段。
